mapper.update: UPDATE board SET local_name = #{localName}, board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} AND member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( local_name, board_title, board_content, member_id, createdate, updatedate ) VALUES ( #{localName}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{memberId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no boardNo, local_name localName, board_title boardTitle, board_content boardContent, member_id memberId, createdate, updatedate FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT local_name localName, count(*) cnt FROM board GROUP BY local_name
